channel.title: Removing Quest?
channel.description: Hey, Can anybody help me remove quest in Deltascape or how do I make them start out with them all done, don't give me some simple answer plz i need explanation.

item.title: Removing Quest?
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“LOLMFAO, post:2, topic:259256”]quests are really just int checking. Like if

if(q12 == 2) {
blah blah blah
} else if (q12 == 3 ) {
blah blah blah
}

etc. etc.

The variables are saved into the character file so open up your character file and search for q1 there should be several q#'s just set the number that they equal to 15 that should finish the quest in delta

removing the quest is much more complicated you have to find everything involving the quest and backspace it but make sure it;s nothing important…[/quote]

There is a lot more than just deleting that. You must remove all the && q12 == 15 or w/e from the weapons. The NPC Dialogue, the clicking most buttons quest interfaces ect…

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Quest?
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Or just search for the login thing and make it set so that all the q’s = 15 lol

Read full topic
